title: Charlie Kirk shooting: Trump blames ‘radical left’, but does not mention attacks on Democrats as search for suspect continues – follow live
summary: In a recent Oval Office address, Trump promised retribution but failed to address key violent incidents, including the murder of Melissa Hortman, the attack on Paul Pelosi, and threats directed at Mike Pence. His speech focused on other issues while omitting these significant events. Critics noted the absence of acknowledgment for such critical matters.

title: TV tonight: stop press! Journalists bicker in a terrific 1980s-set drama
summary: An Australian newsroom series returns with intense moments at an awards show. Additionally, a mother has successfully challenged an 800-year-old law to seek justice for her murdered daughter. Tune in to catch this evening's compelling stories.

title: Weatherwatch: Forecasting’s astrological origins
summary: When the Met Office was established in 1854, weather forecasting was prohibited due to the 1735 Witchcraft Act. This law considered such practices superstitious and illegal. The ban on forecasting reflects the historical context in which modern meteorological science emerged.

title: Post your questions for Nick Offerman
summary: The star of "Parks and Rec," "The Last of Us," and the upcoming crime thriller "Sovereign" is set to engage with fans in a Q&A session. Known for his deadpan humor, impressive facial hair, and woodwork skills, he'll be answering questions from the audience. This event highlights his multifaceted talents beyond acting.
